name: Next Station: Zombies
description:
"Next Station: Zombies" is an indie-casual game that throws you into a post-apocalyptic world infested with hordes of ravenous zombies.

As the last hope for humanity, you find yourself aboard a specialized train armed with powerful weaponry. Your mission is to rid the railway of the undead menace by constructing an arsenal of formidable weapons on the train car itself.

Will you be able to fend off the relentless onslaught of zombies and secure a safe passage to the next station?

Game Features :
- Base Building and Weapon Crafting
- Intense Zombie Battles
- More than 20 levels
